TableField.name: WasteID
TableField.phrase: Waste ID|An automatically assigned number used to track chemical waste associated with this chemical

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization responsible for generating the waste

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization responsible for generating the waste

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this waste stream

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this waste stream

TableField.name: WasteTypeID
TableField.phrase: Waste Type|A combined field used to describe this waste disposal type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: WasteCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad category used to group waste streams of similar types

CodeField.name: WasteCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad category used to group waste streams of similar types

ForeignField.name: WasteTypeName
ForeignField.phrase: Waste Type|A title or phrase used to describe a specific type of waste stream

ForeignField.name: WasteTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of the waste stream
ForeignField.sample: The mobile parts washers use benzene to clean mechanical parts during maintenance. The benzene is a hazardous liquid and can only be disposed of at an approved hazardous wastes disposal facility.

ForeignField.name: WasteType
ForeignField.phrase: Waste Type|A combined field used to describe this waste disposal type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: WasteGenerationMethodID
TableField.phrase: Waste Generation Method|The method by which the waste stream was generated

CodeField.name: WasteGenerationMethod
CodeField.phrase: Waste Generation Method|The method by which the waste stream was generated

TableField.name: Solid
TableField.phrase: Solid|Check this box if this waste is present on site as a solid

TableField.name: Liquid
TableField.phrase: Liquid|Check this box if this waste is present on site as a liquid

TableField.name: Gas
TableField.phrase: Gas|Check this box if this waste is present on site as a gas

TableField.name: WasteName
TableField.phrase: Waste Name|The name used to identify the waste stream

TableField.name: WasteDesc
TableField.phrase: Waste Description|A detailed description of the waste stream being tracked
TableField.sample: All cardboard received into the Receiving area is broken down and transfered to the cardboard storage area. The recycling contractor picks up the cardboard within two days of being contacted by telephone.

TableField.name: DisposalApproachID
TableField.phrase: Disposal Approach|A method of classifying and tracking methods of waste disposal

CodeField.name: DisposalApproach
CodeField.phrase: Disposal Approach|A method of classifying and tracking methods of waste disposal

TableField.name: ChemicalInvolved
TableField.phrase: Chemical Involved|Whether this waste stream involves a chemical

TableField.name: ChemicalID
TableField.phrase: Primary Chemical|A combined field used to describe this chemical when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: ChemicalOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Primary Chemical Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for chemical oversight for this specific chemical throughout the organization

ForeignField.name: ChemicalOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Primary Chemical Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for chemical oversight for this specific chemical throughout the organization

ForeignField.name: Chemical
ForeignField.phrase: Primary Chemical|A combined field used to describe this chemical when associating it with other records

TableField.name: SystemProcessInvolved
TableField.phrase: System or Process Involved|Whether this waste stream is the result of a system or process

TableField.name: SystemID
TableField.phrase: Primary System|A combined field used to describe this system when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: SystemOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Primary System Organization|The name of the organization where the system or process exists

ForeignField.name: SystemOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Primary System Organization|The name of the organization where the system or process exists

ForeignField.name: SystemLocationID
ForeignField.phrase: Primary System Location|Specific location within the facility where the system is located

ForeignField.name: SystemLocation
ForeignField.phrase: System Location|Specific location within the facility where the system is located

ForeignField.name: System
ForeignField.phrase: Primary System|A combined field used to describe this system when associating it with other records
ForeignField.sample: Ammonia Refrigeration System; Active Agenda, HQ

TableField.name: LocalWasteIDs
TableField.phrase: Local Waste IDs|Local regulatory waste identification numbers. Numbers should be separated by commas

TableField.name: OrgWasteIDs
TableField.phrase: Organizational Waste IDs|Organizational regulatory waste identification numbers. Numbers should be separated by commas

TableField.name: AmtGenYear
TableField.phrase: Amount Generated Per Year|The amount of waste generated by this chemical per year

TableField.name: AmtGenYearUnitsID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: AmtGenYearUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: AmtGenYearUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: AmtGenYearUnits
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: LocalDisposalPractice
TableField.phrase: Local Disposal Practice|A detailed description of the waste disposal practices associated with this chemical at this organization
TableField.sample: Excess material requiring disposal is recycled using California's' CalMax Program. All excess waste is collected in 5 gallon buckets and stored at 45 degrees F within the raw ingredient storage warehouse

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the waste stream

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the waste stream

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Waste
CombinedField.phrase: Waste|A combined field used to describe this waste when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Cardboard; Cardboard boxes from Receiving; Active Agenda, HQ

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
